OOC: Hmm. I just discovered Stephen King, so I haven't read that much yet. =
I've read Thinner, Misery (my favorite), all 6 of the Green Miles, most of =
the short stories in Night Shift, and I'm currently working on The Running =
Man. This is going to screw up the RPG board, so I'm going to create a topi=
c for it at the site...


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg=
@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 13, 2001 8:30 P=
M
  Subject: Re: The RPers Site & IGL


  << OOC: Unitron, you read Stephen=
 King? Purpurfargade Ansiktet!!... >>

  (No, I've seen a lot of the movies=
 though.  I love "Sometimes They Come 
  Back", and seeing "It" when you're=
 5 is very scary.  Have you ever read the 
  book by Stephen King where it =
has that evil magician Flagg in it?  And the 
  two sons, one fat and one l=
ocked up in a tower?  I can't remember the title)
